feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
